item.title: 1.1安装与运行环境
item.description: Install #ubuntu sudo apt-get install make gcc openssl libssl-dev libncurses-dev libwxgtk3.0-dev m4 glibc-devel build autoconf sudo apt install -y libncurses-dev libwxgtk3.0-dev m4; ## CentOS yum -y install make gcc gcc-c++ kernel-devel m4 ncurses-devel openssl-devel wget https://github.com/erlang/otp/archive/OTP-21.0.tar.gz tar -zxf otp-OTP-21.0.tar.gz cd otp-OTP-21.0 ./otp_build autoconf ./configure --enable-native-libs make sudo make install 依赖库说明 lib库 功能 libncurses-dev 系统的必备库,基础
